properties.description: Bushcamp next to lake and water treatment plant.
properties.name: Bush camp

properties.description: Bushcamp near little village and dry river. USD 5 paid to villlage chief.
properties.name: Bush camp

properties.description: Sandy place with a few trees next to lodge. View over waterhole. A large group of elephants daily comes drinking, bathing and taking salt in from a sandhole that is a few meters from a hide at the campground.
properties.name: Tuskers Camp

properties.description: Community run campground and cottages in Moribane Forest Reserve. Sites on sand in forest. Buckets with hot water are provided on request.Guided tours into the forest are offered.
properties.name: Moribane Forest Reserve - Ndzou Camp

properties.description: Reasonably well maintained grassy site with great view
properties.name: Botanic Garden Campsite & Caravan Park

properties.description: Grassy campground, mostly under trees with lakeview. Ablutions OK. Also cottages are provided. Showers are heated up in the morning.
properties.name: Casa Msika

properties.description: Small grassy terrain. Well maintained. Wood fire for hot water. No mountain view.
properties.name: Ndundu Backpackers & Campsite

properties.description: Beautiful, park-like environment. Belonging to La Rochelle guesthouse and botanic garden. Ablutions poorly maintained.
properties.name: Penhalonga - La Rochelle Country House

properties.description: Small grassy terrain on short walking distance from Muzarazi Falls. Reception at Far & Wide Lodge. Park fee must be paid to access campground.
properties.name: Muzarazi Campsite

properties.description: Very large grassy field with trees and lots of braais.
properties.name: Mare Caravan Park

properties.description: Well maintained lodge and restaurant that offers camping facilities. Campers stay at the lawn behind the lodge. Public toilets, shower in one of the rooms. Many peacocks around.
properties.name: Denise's Kitchen

properties.description: Small area behind cottages for campers, separate lawn for tents under trees. On walking distance of village and falls
properties.name: Shoestring Backpackers

properties.addr:street: Access Road to Lake Macilwane Recreational Park (South Bank Game Park)
properties.name: Mazowe Sailing Club

properties.description: Large sandy places with trees close to the Zambesi.
properties.name: Campsite Kubu Lodge
